node.name: Social Platform
node.description: A social platform where you can share your thoughts. The platform allows users to sign up or sign in. All the posts made by everyone in the platform is visible to the user and any logged in user can post and comment on other posts. Comments by a user can be deleted by the same user only and the same is for the post.

node.name: Archero
node.description: Move the hero around to avoid attacks from the monster while trying to destroy those monsters. Hero only shoots when it is stationary. The monsters get stronger as level increase. Hero can be upgraded in terms of both health and damage. Coins can be obtained by killing the monsters. When monsters die, there is a 27.27% chance of dropping a health item. This heals hero by 500 health points. Details about total coins, total health of hero and damage caused by hero is saved in the local storage.

node.name: Password Generator
node.description: Create a strong and robust password using the provided password generator. Can include or not include capital letters, symbols and numbers based on supplied input to the generator. Also, the number of digits can be customized. After the generation password can be copied using the copy password button.

node.name: Flappy Bird
node.description: Our favorite Annoying flappy bird implementation using html5 canvas and vanilla ES6 javascript.

node.name: Car lane game with bullet
node.description: Fun project. Allows the player to navigate through traffic and switch lanes to avoid the other cars. The player can turn left and right in the three lanes and also can fire bullet to destroy the car in front of them.

node.name: Responsive Organizational Landing Page with Sliders and Tabs
node.description: This is a responsive landing page for an organization. Highly customizable and contains essential layouts for a proper landing page. As it is constructed in html5. css3 and vanilla JavaScript, it has high performance and high flexibility.

node.name: Stock Market App
node.description: UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Keep track of currency and stock market from a single app. Currency, Stock Price (Enable CORS extension Required), Broker Contact and Calculator is completed.

node.name: E-commerce Website
node.description: Full Stack E-commerce application that allows shopping online

node.name: Breaking Bad Cast
node.description: Information about breaking bad cast. Searchable with name.

node.name: COVID Stats
node.description: Keep track of COVID-19 statistics. Statistics available for each country and entire world.

node.name: Weather App
node.description: An application that detects and shows current weather at your location. Also provides search facilities.

node.name: Expense Tracker App
node.description: App to keep track of Income and Expenditure.

node.name: Recipe App
node.description: Allows user to search for a recipe and ingredients for any keyword using the recipe API.
